transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haanji, Manisha kaise hain?
Customer: Theek hoon, madam.
Executive: Sir, actually na woh mujhe discussion karna tha aapse, aap jo address ke liye bol rahe the mujhe aapne jo bola hua tha toh maine na piche backend team pe bhi dala hua tha concern. Toh udhar se mujhe mail aaya tha ki jo GST mein aapke address uthte hain na.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Toh wahi address aapka primary address pe padta hai. Agar aap usme additional address apna karna chahte ho toh woh waha pe ho sakta hai, pehli possibility. Second, agar aapne jaise apna office kahin pe tha pehle but abhi aapne shifting ki apna office kahin aur shift kiya hua hai. Toh aap uska rent agreement ya phir apna electricity bill aap agar hume provide kar dete hain then hum uske basis pe aapka address jo hai woh change karwa dete hain, theek hai? Ab aapne jo bola mujhe ki property aapki hai but ab waha pe koi office nahi hai. Toh us concern pe hum aapka primary jo address hai woh hum change nahi kar sakte hain.
Customer: Achha. Nahi nahi jaise madam, jaise Julai mein hai mera woh toh hai hi.
Executive: Haan haan, uske alawa ek aur address aap map karna chahte ho?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan toh woh main aapko ek bari video meeting pe bata deti hoon ki kaise hoga. Woh aap usme na secondary address karke aap map kar sakte ho.
Customer: Achha mere mein ho jayega na woh?
Executive: Haan haan, aapki side se ho jayega, theek hai? Achha aur aur dusri cheez yeh bhi sir mujhe jaani thi ki aapne kuch buylead ko na not relevant mark kiya hua tha.
Customer: Matlab jo part loading hai na madam.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Woh kya hai main nahi karta. Apna kya hai full load ka kaam hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Toh pehle kya hai apne ko pata nahi tha ki bhai part load actual mein hota kya hai aise karke. Toh main jaise kabhi mil jayega toh apan usko le lenge aise type ka rehta tha gaadiyan jaise jaati hain toh kuch kabhi kabhar maal kam lete hain.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Toh jo usko apan le lenge aise type ka tha magar woh kaam ho nahi pa raha hai. Ab uske against mein woh mere ko khali mil bhi jo lead mein hai na khali part load part load hi aa raha hai.
Executive: Hmm. Kyunki usko pehle aapne consume kiya hua hai na is wajah se woh aapke paas mein zyada aa rahi hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi usko hatana hai mere kaam ka nahi hai woh.
Executive: Achha toh ab part load se aapko kaam nahi karna hai aap yeh bolna chahte ho?
Customer: Part load, mere ko sirf full load.
Executive: Theek hai. Aur ek aapke paas mein tempo transport type ka aaya hua tha.
Customer: Tempo transport woh bhi nahi karna madam, woh hai hi nahi, hum karte hi nahi woh.
Executive: Ek minute dijiyega main ek bari check kar leti hoon. Shayad aapke catalog mein added hai is wajah se yeh humare paas aa raha tha.
Customer: Ji ji madam, maine kya hai pehle bol diya tha tempo hai yeh maine check kiya tha Delhi mein shayad Karul Bagh mein karne ke liye.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Toh shayad us wajah se hoga kya hai abhi mera Karul Bagh ka kaam chalu nahi hua hai madam.
Executive: Achha achha. Aur sir aapne matlab jo ek bari mera aapse last time discussion ho raha tha, ek aapka case koi deal phasi hui thi beech mein ki aap usse baat karna cha rahe the aur woh kya bolte hain Chhattisgarh ki lead thi.
Customer: Woh toh madam mera toh fraud ho gaya uske.
Executive: Kya aapne usme bhi?
Customer: Nahi madam woh toh kaha woh matlab uska koi registration hi nahi tha usne mera toh nuksaan karwa diya madam ₹40,000 ka. Ab woh toh kaise karwa diya?
Customer: Are madam usne gaadi manga mujhe maine gaadi de diya usko matlab gaadi maine chaar gaadiyan diesel dalwa ke advance paisa deke bhej diya company ne. Hai na? Ab woh samne wala banda waha hai hi nahi.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Waha pe theek toh aapki pehle baat chit nahi hui thi GST waghra aapne office nahi liya hota?
Customer: Haan maine uska kuch mang manga nahi documents isliye woh kya hai mere se thoda sa matlab mere se hi galti ho gaya aise maan ke chalo aap.
Executive: Haan haan matlab pehle agar document waghra le liya hota GST waghra le liya hota office ka toh aapko bhi clear ho jata hai na?
Customer: Haan haan ab maine kya usne bola maine gaadi bhej diya chaar gaadi madam ₹40,000 ka nuksaan ho gaya ₹10-10,000 ka gaadi mein leke bhej diya.
Executive: Right sir, koi baat nahi ab aage se kam se kam cheeze clear rahengi ki aapko aisa nahi karna hai karke hai na? Kyunki kyunki aapka hi ek tarah se chala gaya nuksaan hua waha pe agar nahi bhejte toh phir shayad us jagah pe koi aur convert hota.
Customer: Haan madam haan haan main toh main aur premium le leta madam ₹40,000 ka ek saal ka aur aa jata.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Theek hai. Uske alawa aur koi abhi maine aapko rating ke liye bola hua tha aapne rating ke liye thodi aaj time.
Customer: Madam main na bahut busy ho gaya tha kaam se hi leke. Hai na toh isliye main office chhod ke chale gaya tha toh nahi de paya hoon.
Executive: Hmm. Abhi aapke paas mein na last month mein ek rating mili hui hai aur kaafi achchi hai woh, theek hai five star rating hai. Toh woh yeh Om Prakash karke inhone aapko diya hua tha rate kiya hua tha aur proper descriptions bhi likha hua hai aapke bihaf se aapki company ke bihaf se toh yeh kaafi achchi hai aapke liye.
Customer: Achha. Woh woh mere ko dikhayenge kya madam kaha se aaya maine dekha nahi hai usko.
Executive: Haan main dikha deti hoon aapko, theek hai? Aur mujhe haan address change karna hai main aapko madam uska na photo khich ke bhej dijiyega mere paas actual mein mera kaam abhi chalu ho raha hai toh main thoda busy hoon baad mein aapse main baat karunga. Thoda sa line up kar leta hoon kaam ko, theek hai?
Customer: Madam.
Executive: Woh main address change karne ke liye aapko phone kiya hua tha ki main ek bari aapko bata do. Aap koi baat nahi aapka kaam start hota hoga koi baat nahi aap mujhe time bata do kab tak aap available ho jaoge tab hum video meet karke aapko saari cheeze sahi karwa dete hain.
Customer: Madam main na aaj kaunsa hai Wednesday hai na toh main Saturday ko na thoda online aap mere ko ek bari video calling kar lijiyega jaise aapke office ka chutti nahi rahega toh.
Executive: Saturday ko sir humara nahi rehta hai aur.
Customer: Office nahi rehta hai na?
Executive: Nahi matlab off rahega na toh hum log rahenge nahi yaha pe office mein.
Customer: Aur Sunday ko madam?
Executive: Itna zyada time nahi lagna hai 10-15 minute ka time nahi milega aaj aapko kisi bhi time pe?
Customer: Main main kehna abhi bahut hi busy hoon madam yeh dekho phone bhi aa raha hai.
Executive: Theek hai koi baat nahi sir. A phir main check kar leti hoon apni side se hi aap jab bhi available hoiyega toh mujhe ek bari call back kar lena, theek hai? Madam aur ji jitne review diya hai na uska mere ko shayad kuch screenshot waghra hi leke ya photo khich ke bhej dijiyega agar kam hoga.
Customer: Sure, sure main aapko bhej deti hoon.
Customer: Ji madam ji.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to add secondary address to profile.

- Marked buyleads as not relevant.

- Tempo transport leads are not required.

- Fraud of ₹40,000.

- Wants screenshot of the reviews.



Resolution:

- Explained process for adding secondary address.

- Explained why part load leads are being received.

- Executive will check and remove tempo transport.

- Advised to take documents before sending goods.

- Agreed to send screenshot of reviews.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back on Saturday.



Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- address, buyleads, fraud, reviews, rating
